HEADER.Title: exits the action when some error occurs

SCRIPT.MSCRI: : SWITCH &$PLATFORM# : CASE "WINDOWS" SET ERROR=1 : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR set retcode=%ERROR% goto :retcode : CASE "UNIX" error=1 : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR exit $error : OTHER : ENDSWITCH
